channel.title: Camping on YOUR DAILY LIMERICK
channel.description: Recent content in Camping on limericks.dailyonthis.site

item.description: An electrician went camping one day He was hoping to get some fresh air But his tools wouldn’t stay He was plugging away With an old …
A tailor, who often liked to roam, Found a camping spot far from home. They set up their tent With much contentment, Making a makeshift …
An entrepreneur from the city Went out camping, it was quite a pity He was so tense With no defense But he enjoyed the chance to be free!
An entrepreneur went camping To relax in the great outdoors He was not scared of a bear But found camping quite a chore Still, it was a …
